snippet.title: "Mali is the first victim of Libya," says Rep. Mike Rogers
snippet.description:
* Tonight on OutFront, Rep. Mike Rogers (R-MI) weighed in on the conflict in Mali and said the administration needs an 'overarching' plan for the region.
http://cnnpressroom.blogs.cnn.com/2013/01/16/mali-is-the-first-victim-of-libya-says-rep-mike-rogers/

snippet.title: Islamist rebels gaining ground in Mali, French defense minister says
snippet.description:
* Islamist militants gained ground in one Malian town on Monday even as government troops stepped up their offensive to wrest control from rebels.
http://www.cnn.com/2013/01/14/world/africa/mali-military-offensive/index.html

snippet.title: Algeria attack may have link to Libya camps
snippet.description:
* The terrorists who attacked the In Amenas gas complex in eastern Algeria appear to have been of several nationalities, and may have trained in jihadist camps across the border in southern Libya, according to sources familiar with the situation there.
http://www.cnn.com/2013/01/18/world/africa/algeria-attackers/index.html

snippet.title: POLITICAL HOT TOPICS: Monday, January 14, 2013

snippet.title: Hunger in Niger threatens millions
snippet.description:
* The knock on the door is a sign of bad things to come.
http://www.cnn.com/2012/02/18/world/africa/niger-hunger/index.html

snippet.title: Boko Haram: Why terror group kidnaps schoolgirls, and what happens next
snippet.description:
* It is a parent's worst nightmare: Your child goes to school, never to return home.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/04/24/world/africa/nigeria-kidnapping-answers/index.html

snippet.title: Spain arrests 7 suspected of sending militant fighters to Syria
snippet.description:
* Police in Spain and Morocco arrested seven suspected Islamist militants who recruited and sent fighters for al Qaeda terrorist organizations in Syria and Mali, Spain's Interior Ministry said Friday.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/03/14/world/europe/spain-militants-arrested/index.html
